original_text: At that time, people will make a noise with trumpets. They will shout when they go to fight in a war.
korean_text: 나팔을 불어 경고하며 견고한 성읍들을 치며 높은 망대를 치는 날이로다

sentences.original_text: people will make a noise with trumpets
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 나팔을 불며 소리를 낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: when they go to fight in a war
